content.prompt: The customary destruction of Malagan display objects after their use has been interpreted as

choices.label: representing the ritual sacrifice of the objects as an offering to the gods
constituting the transfer of the objects into the realm of ancestral spirits
demonstrating that the objects have ceased to serve their spiritual function
symbolizing the destruction of negative forces that who might threaten the community

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
